New Comp/Circular-2010 
 
// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated: 13 /01/2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 02 / 2010 
 
 
 
Subject:-  Access of Vehicle upto the aircraft at civil airports in the    
                  country on  protocol /security / medical grounds.  
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No.12/2008  dated 10.11.2008, on the 
subject mentioned above.  
 
 
02. 
Shri S.Jaipal Reddy, Hon’ble Minister for Urban Development, is permitted 
to avail facility of Airport Operator’s ferry vehicle to and from aircraft, during 
arrival and departure at all civil airports in the country for a further period of one 
year, on medical grounds.   
 
 
 
 
 
 ( M. Malaviya, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
 
Copy to: 
 
MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi   :      
w.r.to MCA letter   No.AV.13024/37/2003-SS  dated 29.12.2009
